meanings.meaning: 1. anti-

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to return (something); to restore; to put back See also 帰す かえす, esp. 返すお金は明日返すよ。I'll give you back the money tomorrow.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to turn over; to turn upside down; to overturn

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to pay back; to retaliate; to reciprocate esp. 返すお前は恩を仇で返したな。You bit the hand that fed you.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to respond (with); to retort; to reply; to say back

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'su' ending
meanings.meaning: 5. to do ... back (e.g. speak back, throw back) after the -masu stem of a verb

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'su' ending
meanings.meaning: 6. to do again; to do repeatedly after the -masu stem of a verb
反す 【かえす】
